post.body: ! and !! I *love* Cajun cooking, practically grew up on the stuff. I slather Tabasco on the hot buffalo wings to add flavor.
@Astrogirl426 Unless they actually are Cajun. Then you can serve them truck tires blackened and basted in Tabasco.
That's okay, I thing I just had a foodgasm.
It's a short distance from the infliction of pain to Cajun cooking. (It's the pepper mostly.)
I think I just gained 5 pounds from these tweets...
Hushpuppies. And the iced Luzianne tea.
Her mouth was still burning three hours later.
I'm just gonna say... Shrimp and grits, cold beer, and etouffee`. Followed by chickory and beignettes.
Stand in line babe. I've got a casual one, a formal one, and one that's just disturbing (and not in a good way).
You can imagine how surprised she was at her first mouthful. Then she wanted to know what was in it. I couldn't tell her...
We stopped to get gas in LA on way from TN back to TX and my wife wanted to know what file' was. I told her, "Don't try it."
I will be gracious in my victory as I am sure you would have been in yours. I won't even say Neener, Neener, Neener. #butIwon
Have you ever tried to explain okra to somebody who's never heard of it?
When I moved to Oregon I got homesick (for TX) and decided to make gumbo. Went to get the ingredients and experienced culture shock
Sure is! It's one of those surreal, cross-media things where it's almost like being there with a couple thousand close friends.
You know that on the 8th day God made Tabasco, right? That and red beans and rice.
"Nukeular". Game, set, and match. #badwordpoker (Which means that I just mixed metaphors on you too.)
It's coming in great for me!
That's why I always carry an emergency bottle with me. Just in case, you know they're *out of it*. Shudder.
Awefully perfect in every way!
If they're under 13, they get one sock apiece. No use wasting them on the ungrateful critters...
Of course, you'd almost have to match numbers/usage against the predominant industry in an area to get a better picture.
That's why I buy extra tube socks when getting presents. You piss me off you get socks. Simple, fair, and cheap. Like me.
What's the high % usage? And if we're above that do we have to refund somebody or give them to another city?
I usually don't find out until Dec 26th when the recriminations start. Enjoy your false sense of accomplishment...
I'm answering random questions? How are you? Oh, and why do men have nipples?
A fat stoner?
BJ was an abomination. Trapper John got his name because his date claimed he "trapped" her in the railway car when caught.
Umm... An idea?
The last time I saw my copy it was near that Abbie Hoffman "Steal This Book...". I think they got confused.
Coming your way. It might look like snow first.
It doesn't scare me that I'm not a girl, but you should be *very* scared that you think like me. I know I am!
Oh, and BTW, anytime *anybody* says "I was going to use that same phrase" I get scared. One is too many of ppl like me...
I have a sudden urge for somthing I can't identify deep fried and swimming in Tabasco. With rice, of course.
Are you a math whiz? Try http://math.alltop.com/
Goodnight y'all! I'll be out of pocket driving to Alabama for most of the day. Be excellent.
Found Sonny (http://snipr.com/928yh) online thanks to @om. Mindless entertainment upgraded to joyous waste of time.
RT @taxgirl: This made me cry: http://tinyurl.com/a44lvq I love Lance. More folks need to hear about this...
If Hawkey was the Last of the Mohicans, who was the Next to Last of the Mohicans?
My Twitemperature is a RED HOT 116°F (47°C)! http://twitemperature.com/CrazyOnYou. Funny, I feel well. Got any aspirin?
